text:
Intrepid Networks | Software Engineer | Orlando, FL | Onsite; Remote | Full-Time | Citizen

Intrepid-Networks is an Orlando start-up providing services to first-responders nation wide.

We are hiring a full-time back-end/web developer ASAP. Our current back-end is written in Grails with the views written in a combination of JQuery/Backbone and GSP Views. If interested head over to http://www.intrepid-networks.com, scroll to the bottom, and click "Join our team". If you have any further questions feel free to email joemccall [at] intrepid-networks [dot] com.
